text: Juan Ignacio Antonio (born 5 January 1988) is an Argentine former professional football who played as a forward. ==External links== * Argentine Primera statistics * Player profile on the River Plate website Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:People from Trelew Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Club Atlético River Plate footballers Category:Brescia Calcio players Category:Ascoli Calcio 1898 F.C. players Category:U.C.
